name: Verify email addresses stored in Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet in Hunter
description:
This template allows you to do a Hunter email verification from a new row in your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet. The worksheet is then updated with the status of the email.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygSH_kVhXjXbCV98Q?e=TqwG4S).
